gen:link.label:label: PBV40: If the Asset ID Code Type equals "CAU", the asset should be generally be reported as "not listed in a stock exchange" or "not exchange tradable", although there might be some exemptions. -->Template 1: PF.06.02; Validation: {c0010} like "CAU/.*" and {c0010} like not "CAU/ISIN/.*"; Expression: {c0230} like 'XL1#' or {c0230} like 'XL2#' or {c0230} like 'XL3#' or {c0230} like 'XL4#' or {c0230} like 'XL5#' or {c0230} like 'XL6#' or {c0230} like 'XT1#' or {c0230} like 'XT2#' or {c0230} like 'XT3#' or {c0230} like 'XT4#' or {c0230} like 'XT5#' or {c0230} like 'XT6#'

PBV40: If the Asset ID Code Type equals "CAU", the asset should be generally be reported as "not listed in a stock exchange" or "not exchange tradable", although there might be some exemptions. -->Template 1: PF.06.02; Validation: {c0010} like "CAU/.*" and {c0010} like not "CAU/ISIN/.*"; Expression: {c0230} like 'XL1#' or {c0230} like 'XL2#' or {c0230} like 'XL3#' or {c0230} like 'XL4#' or {c0230} like 'XL5#' or {c0230} like 'XL6#' or {c0230} like 'XT1#' or {c0230} like 'XT2#' or {c0230} like 'XT3#' or {c0230} like 'XT4#' or {c0230} like 'XT5#' or {c0230} like 'XT6#'
